active_learning.discussion_prompt: In a group discussion, analyze how improper signature verification contributed to real-world attacks like the Flame malware (which forged Microsoft signatures). Debate the impact on the CIA triad (focus on integrity and authenticity) and propose mitigations aligned with OWASP Top 10 A02:2021 Cryptographic Failures. Use analogies like comparing digital signatures to handwritten ones on checks.
active_learning.peer_teaching: Explain the key concepts to a partner without using technical jargon.
active_learning.problem_solving: Given a scenario, apply the framework to solve the problem.

Ensure distractors are similar in length and complexity
